DOC.brief_title: Comparison Preoperative ABUS MRI Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective pilot study investigate use Automated Breast Ultrasound preoperative evaluation newly diagnose breast cancer patient . The Investigator intend demonstrate preoperative automate breast ultrasound ( ABUS ) provide relatively inexpensive well-tolerated alternative MRI detection occult breast cancer miss mammography hand-held ultrasound woman newly diagnose breast cancer . The research take place University Kansas Medical Center ( KUMC ) . The research study open newly diagnose breast cancer patient present KUMC recommendation preoperative MRI fit inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: Women ( age 18100 ) undergo preoperative evaluation University Kansas Cancer Center ( KUCC ) new diagnosis breast cancer Patients diagnosis breast cancer either core needle biopsy excisional biopsy . Bilateral mammography handheld ultrasound ( clinically indicate ) perform prior MRI ABUS . If breast MRI advise contraindication MRI , breast MRI ABUS perform KUCC ( Study Arm 1 ) . If breast MRI perform , ABUS exam without MRI perform ( Study Arm 2 ) . The MRI ABUS exam must obtain within 2 week .
